content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our property. To commence our discussion about the rental price, please propose a figure that suits your budget, and I'll consider it closely. If we can reach an agreement on that number, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, we may have to reevaluate or end the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a fair start. I propose a price of 700 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your offer is lower than I anticipated, Emilia, I find myself in a challenging position due to the apartment's prime location and exceptional features. Currently considering your proposal, I hope we can find common ground. If you increase your offer slightly, we might be able to reach an agreement. However, if no progress is made, I may have to reconsider our dialogue and potentially end the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I'm willing to increase my offer. I propose 750 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Upon assessing your new proposal, Emilia, I must still emphasize the apartment's exceptional qualities and the competitive market for such properties. While your increased offer is more aligned with my expectations, please consider one last adjustment for us to reach an agreement. If you feel unable to elevate your offer further, I regret to inform you that we may need to terminate our negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I propose 775 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: After careful deliberation, Emilia, I find your latest proposal more satisfactory, considering the apartment's unique attributes and the desirability of its location. I am pleased to announce that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. 'I agree to the price of 775 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
